statements: SELECT * FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_name, boundary_polygon FROM protected_zones WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, zone_name FROM protected_zones ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT id, zone_name, ST_AsText(boundary_polygon) as boundary FROM protected_zones WHERE ST_Intersects(boundary_polygon, 'POINT(0 0)');
SELECT avg(id) as average_id, count(*) as total_zones FROM protected_zones;
SELECT * FROM protected_zones WHERE id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, boundary_polygon FROM protected_zones WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT id, zone_name FROM protected_zones WHERE ST_AREA(boundary_polygon) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM protected_zones WHERE id IN (3, 7, 9);
SELECT zone_name, ST_ASTEXT(boundary_polygon) AS boundary FROM protected_zones WHERE ST_CONTAINS(boundary_polygon, POINT(10, 20));
SELECT * FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM zone_boundaries;
SELECT * FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT zone_id, COUNT(*) AS boundary_count FROM zone_boundaries GROUP BY zone_id HAVING boundary_count > 3;
SELECT MAX(zone_id) AS max_zone_id, MIN(zone_id) AS min_zone_id FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_name, ST_AsGeoJSON(boundary_coordinates) AS boundary_geojson FROM protected_zones JOIN zone_boundaries ON protected_zones.zone_id = zone_boundaries.zone_id WHERE zone_name = 'Mountain';
SELECT * FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM zone_boundaries ORDER BY boundary_id DESC;
SELECT zone_id, boundary_point FROM zone_boundaries WHERE boundary_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_name, zone_description FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT zone_name, boundary_coordinates FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT zone_name, boundary_point FROM protected_zones INNER JOIN zone_boundaries ON protected_zones.zone_id = zone_boundaries.zone_id;
SELECT zone_name, restriction_type, restriction_details FROM protected_zones INNER JOIN zone_restrictions ON protected_zones.zone_id = zone_restrictions.zone_id WHERE restriction_type = 'No Entry';
SELECT * FROM protected_zones;
SELECT zone_name, boundary_polygon FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT boundary_name, ST_AsText(boundary_coords) FROM zone_boundaries WHERE zone_id = 2;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM zone_activities WHERE zone_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_type DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM zone_visitors WHERE zone_id = 4 AND visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_name, boundary_polygon FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_id = 2;
SELECT boundary_name, boundary_coords FROM zone_boundaries WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name, activity_type FROM zone_activities;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM zone_visitors WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM protected_environment_zones;
SELECT zone_name, boundaries FROM protected_environment_zones WHERE zone_id = 1;
SELECT zone_coordinates.latitude, zone_coordinates.longitude FROM zone_coordinates WHERE zone_id = 2;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM zone_visitors WHERE zone_id = 3 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM zone_activities WHERE zone_id = 4 AND activity_type = 'Hiking';
SELECT * FROM protected_environment_zones;
SELECT zone_name, boundaries FROM protected_environment_zones WHERE zone_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM zone_coordinates ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM zone_visitors WHERE zone_id = 1 AND visit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM zone_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Hiking' ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
